preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 10 g of Ac, 240 g of B, 10 g of K, and 20 g of Sm using a precision scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine Ac and B thoroughly. 
 3. Gradually add K to the mixture while continuously stirring. 
 4. Finally, incorporate Sm into the mixture, ensuring a uniform distribution of all components.
